content.description: Researchers are investigating the effects of a 20-minute antibullying video on adolescent helping behavior. Fifty-seven eighth-grade students from a middle school are participating.
content.question: Based on the information presented, which of the following is the dependent variable in the study?

topic.text: 3.9: Social, Cognitive, and Neurological Factors in Learning

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
